recipes.title: Cookies
recipes.description: Delicious, crisp on the outside, chewy on the inside, oozing with chocolatey goodness cookies. The best kind.
recipes.instructions:
1. Go buy a packet of Chips Ahoy
2. Heat it up in the oven
3. Enjoy warm cookies
4. Learn how to bake cookies from somewhere else

recipes.title: Ramen
recipes.description: Ramen is a Japanese noodle dish. It consist of Chinese-style wheat noodles searved in a meat or fish-based broth.
recipes.instructions: boil noodle in chicken or beef broth.
